text: aur un teenon par bhee jo peechhe chhod die gae the, yahaan tak ki jab dharatee vishaal hote hue bhee unapar tang ho gaee aur unake praan unapar dubhar ho gae aur unhonne samajha ki allaah se bachane ke lie koee sharan nahin mil sakatee hai to usee ke yahaan. phir usane unapar krpa-drshti kee taaki ve palat aaen. nissandeh allaah hee tauba qabool karanevaala, atyant dayaavaan hai
